channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Winter storm packing snow and strong winds to descend on Great Lakes and Northeast
item.description: A wild winter storm is bringing strong winds, heavy snow and frigid temperatures to the Great Lakes and Northeast.

item.title: 2 New Jersey pilots killed in a helicopter collision frequented a cafe together near the crash site
Court releases transcript from closed hearing for man accused of killing Charlie Kirk
